title: Facebook's Ad Sales Taking a Hit
itunes:title: Facebook's Ad Sales Taking a Hit
description:
Bloomberg Technology Executive Editor Tom Giles discusses Facebook ad sales taking a hit as companies like Starbucks and Diageo bail. He says the social media giant hasn't done a good job of keeping harmful content off its site, although it has taken steps.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
